website_summaries.verdict: Moisturize your skin with this natural shea and cocoa butter lotion. It's rich, non-greasy, and ideal for dry, rough skin on your hands or feet, or as an all-over body moisturizer.
pros: Free from parabens, phthalates, propylene glycol, and dyes
Great for carrying around in your bag
cons: Some think the scent is too sweet

customer_reviews.title: Goodbye dry/cracked hands for a man!
customer_reviews.text: As a dude I'm cautious as to which lotion I choose, I don't want it to smell too feminine. With that being said, I do like the smell of pomegranate. This stuff is perfect for a guy who is in continuous contact with boxes and other dry/absorbing stuff. This cream lasts a long time and doesn't produce too strong of a fruity smell. My hands look much better and I take pride in being hygienic. A little goes a long way. I still have about half a tube left after 2 months of daily use. Will be buying again. I added before and after pics.
customer_reviews.author: I'm a Moose

customer_reviews.title: Has this cream been tampered with??
customer_reviews.text: I really like This hand cream. It’s very moisturizing. It’s quite lovely. I even gifted to my sister. It sets smooth and semi glossy on hands. Not greasy. Yet, the one i purchased on amazon seemed to have something mixed in it. It was as if someone put soap in the lotion and mixed it. Or conditioner, the texture of the cream wasn’t the usual texture. I usually buy this cream in the market. Therefore, returned. So if you notice the texture is a bit slimy. You’re not getting the real thing. Just a heads up!!
customer_reviews.author: Naila

customer_reviews.title: Not Quite Right
customer_reviews.text: I've used JR watkins Lavender products like hand soap and loved them before but this was my first experience with their hand lotion. I'm guessing it's a fine product but if you've ever smelled a scented lotion when its been unsealed, maybe sat in the heat of your car ,for 5+ years and goes bad? That's what this smells like with a tiny bit of lavender. So even though I ordered it straight from Amazon I suspect it's either fake or very, very old.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Not very moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered three of these now and I have to say I won't be ordering them again. The first time it seemed a little moisturizing and it was inexpensive so I ordered two more. The last two were half empty and felt like wax going on. No moisturization at all. I ordered them all from Amazon, not a third party seller so I think the product itself is just one big miss. In the past I've been very happy with other brands of shea butter creams (Pre de Provence and L'Occitane, even Trader Joe's brand at Christmas). Won't be buying this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Different product
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love JR Watkins hand lotion and have used it for years. I reordered 4 tubes of it from here, 2 of them Lavendar and the texture of the lotion is completely off. One of the things I love about their hand lotion is how thick it is and how well it moisturizes. This new order that I got is thin and does not have the same affect. I am questioning if it’s the same product, although it’s the same packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: The lemon cream is the best smell on the face of this earth!
customer_reviews.text: All my life I have absolutely hated having any type of lotion on my hands: I just did not like how it felt. UNTIL NOW: I love how this lotion feels on my hands -- it soaks in quickly and relieves the dryness immediately. The best thing, however, is the lemon cream smell . . . it is the BEST smell on the face of this earth. I buy this hand cream often to give as gifts, and everyone has loved it too.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE ALL SCENTS
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this hand cream. The fragrance is great, strong enough to make you smile, subtle enough to overload your senses. A very small amount goes a long way, very moisturizing but leaves your hands a little sticky afterwards. I keep buying them and they're amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite hand cream
customer_reviews.text: This is above all my favorite brand of hand creams and I've tried a TON. Shea Butter is at the top of the list of ingredients so it's very moisturizing. I personally love the coconut one - reminds me of the beach...my husband uses these too for his hands - he has bad eczema and it helps. The lemon one smells great too...I found the green one - (can't recall the fragrance) to be a bit strong for my liking...it smells nice, but it's intense so if you don't like scents much maybe avoid that one.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this years ago and it is so good, but hard to find now! So, other than a well known chain store that has a logo like a bullseye, I hadn't been able to find and was thrilled to see that Amazon sells it! It's great for dry callous feet, but also just really deep moisturizing for legs and hands especially! I use it at night on my heels and feet! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: nina beall

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful economical hand cream that I am using time and time again. Would make a wonderful gift.
customer_reviews.text: I bought my first J.R. Watkins hand cream over two years ago. My skin is sensitive and dry and I spend a lot of time getting my hands wet from gardening, bathing pets, doing dishes, etc. I first bought the lemon-scented cream and it is divine--not too sweet-smelling, with a genuine fruity lemon aroma. I've gone through 4 tubes. It's long-lasting. A pea-sized dab will due, especially if your hands are slightly damp. For my recent order, I decided to try lavender. It smells exactly like the lavender in my garden. I'm looking forward to trying other scents.
customer_reviews.author: Llamasaurus

customer_reviews.title: Allergy causing chemical fragrance NOT NATURAL
customer_reviews.text: My wife has had terrible allergies at night. She stopped using this cream at night on hands and near face and no more trouble breathing. This is NOT A NATURAL product. Companies are using the loop hole to cover chemical fragrances with "natural", "botanical" , and any other fancy word. If fragrance is used and not listing what make the scent is chemical. This is a LOOP HOLE companies use. Why in the world do you have to have all these good products and use garbage to scent it. They tell you "its proprietary" and the reason it is if the listed all the chemicals their so called good for you product not so much.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!  New Favorite!
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite, and go-to, hand cream for cracked winter skin! It goes on creamy but quickly absorbs and I was left with soft (not oily) hands. The scent is divine. A commenter said it reminded them of a medicinal cream, but lavender does smell herbal naturally. It’s not perfumey. This hand cream is scented perfectly to me - strong enough to be pleasant but not at all overpowering. If you like lavender, you’ll love this.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: can't believe I ordered more
customer_reviews.text: Love this lotion!! Do not love the scent of lavender usually, but the scent is very subtle and I use on hands every night before bed. On second tube now
customer_reviews.author: KR Mena

customer_reviews.title: Smells grotesque. NOT RETURNABLE! Caveat emptor!
customer_reviews.text: Sorry to say, the lemon fragrance of this lotion is really god awful. Nauseating bad. Had to wash my hands immediately. It is not fresh or vibrant or even lemony. It smells like a plastic factory made the lotion with rancid butter and synthetic artificial sugar. CAUTION! THESE ARE NOT RETURNABLE! So since no one on their right mind would wear these lotions it's going in the garbage. Expensive garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa.

customer_reviews.title: Can't Stand the Scent
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive hands and this lotion didn't trigger a reaction. It is decently moisturizing and dries down pretty fast, but I didn't do my scent research. I just saw "lemon" and some reviews saying "smells amazing" and I was sold. The scent is very heavy and 100% gourmand, with emphasis on cake/sugar rather than lemon. Cloying and strong enough to last through multiple washings. I keep oscillating between "meh, I can make myself get used to it" to "oh god this is actually nauseating," but really, life is too short to be making yourself miserable trying to use up a giant tube of $5 hand cream you can't stand the smell of.
customer_reviews.author: Clare W.

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect, not safety sealed
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the lemon, and the SKU label said lemon on the item that showed up, but alas - it was coconut and honey. As a Christmas gift for my little girl who loves anything lemon, I’m annoyed. There was also neither a plastic safety seal on the tube nor an inner foil seal between the cap and the lotion. Plus the lotion smelled like absolutely nothing. To the garbage! Epic fail all around.
customer_reviews.author: swomprat

customer_reviews.title: works
customer_reviews.text: excellent. I work in the yard and I soak up the lotion nightly. this is a relief. Will buy again. Work great on feet also.
customer_reviews.author: roxy

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love with this product!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I have a Citron Tarte perfume and hoped it would smell similarly....well, this smells way better than the perfume! I absolutely love it. Great moisturizer, not greasy but penetrating. And the scent....indescribably good!
customer_reviews.author: CEECEE

customer_reviews.title: Great lemon smell not greasy
customer_reviews.text: I really love this hand cream. I have it on a subscribe and Save. Smells really nice and I get lots of compliments and people wanting to use this lotion at work. I work in the healthcare industry and have to wash my hands quite a lot so they get chapped and dry. This lotion is creamy not greasy and gives a nice uplifting lemon smell. I really like this company's products and will continue to purchase them.
customer_reviews.author: Vikki

customer_reviews.title: Works well and smells great
customer_reviews.text: This hand cream works well without an overpowering scent. It smells like lemon baked goods but is subtle. A lot of scents give me headaches or make me wheeze but I have no problem with the lemon. If you work in healthcare or anywhere else where you wash your hands constantly than this is a good investment. Also good for cold weather dry hands as well. When I take it to work everyone loves it and wants to use it. I also like that it’s not full of gross chemicals and is still affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah

customer_reviews.title: Sinks in rapidly
customer_reviews.text: This hand cream is perfect for before bed. It sinks in extremely quickly and can be layered. It is very moisturizing and the smell is calming at night. The lavender scent is a little artificial but it still smells nice. It has helped prevent my skin from drying out, on my hands, elbows, and knees.
customer_reviews.author: D Hern

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: Product is moisturizing and a good scent my only dislike is its greasy until it sets in skin.
customer_reviews.author: mzmommy2u

customer_reviews.title: sticky.... prob good for very dry hands....
customer_reviews.text: I have normal skin. Not super dry. it is super sticky... as most of natural ingredients products. If you have sensitive or extremely dry hands, this should work. For me, it is quite sticky and makes my hand very oily. So not for me.. ugh.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Lee

customer_reviews.title: Hands Down Best Lavender Cream EVER !!!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this product !!!! It is my favorite Lavender Cream of all time ! I love how moisturized you feel, definitely NO greasy feeling at all. I did try the JR Watkins Lavender Lotion and not the Cream, I did not care for that product as much. I went back to my old faithful - the Cream. And since a little goes a long way, the tube lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Beth Bellomo

customer_reviews.title: Too oily / greasy for me
customer_reviews.text: I was really hoping to like this product enough to buy again, but that’s not the case. What I like: no parabens No formaldehyde No dye No animal testing No silicones No phthalates What I don’t like: To greasy/oily for me. So for those reasons, I’m out. Although my pros and cons list is heavy on the pros. Just can’t deal with the greasy oiliness of the product.
customer_reviews.author: DoubleA

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: I really like this hand cream. I wash my hands a lot, wear gloves, and my hands feel dry and burning sometimes. The cream goes on thick but after massaging the skin absorbs it very nice. I don’t have sticky feeling afterwards. My hands much softer and I don’t feel any tightness. Most likely to buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha

customer_reviews.title: I've used Watkins' products for years and the lemon handcream is my favorite.
customer_reviews.text: This cream smells wonderful, like lemon cake or cookies. Light and delicate in smell and feel. I like this size tube to carry in my purse. While lemon is my favorite, I also enjoy mango, aloe & green tea in various Watkins products. Great product that has stood the test of time and remains high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Cammei

customer_reviews.title: Won't dry hands, smells so lovely
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this hand lotion, and I'm pretty picky. I hate greasy lotion, and lotion that you need to reapply often because it doesn't hydrate for long. I don't like a strong scent, but I do like a nice scent. And then I'm even more picky in that I want a nice looking tube. This lotion was perfect. I keep it on my desk at work, and use maybe twice daily. Love it, two thumbs way up.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Very greasy!
customer_reviews.text: Smells exactly like lemon meringue pie. The reason I’m giving it 3 stars is because it’s really thick and greasy when applied! I think it might be the Shea butter in it, but it feels more greasy and like it’s “coating” your hands rather than hydrating them. It does make your hands feel soft and fixes dryness
customer_reviews.author: M. S.

customer_reviews.title: I tried this lotion from a "tester" and loved how it felt on my hands
customer_reviews.text: I tried this lotion from a "tester" and loved how it felt on my hands, silky but not "heavy". Even after washing my hands with soap and water, they still felt smooth and soft. The lemon scent is a bonus for me, I think lemon/citrus just smells fresh and clean. I purchased the body lotion from the store, after I got home, I decided to order hand creams for Christmas gifts. The gifts were a hit. I will most definitely purchase these again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great lotion but can't stand the SWEET cake-like smell
customer_reviews.text: I ended up returning this because the cake-like lemon smell is over powering for me. I LOVE lemon and never have a problem ordering that scent, but this one is really sweet to the extent I couldn't stand it. I returned it and got the Aloe scent, which isn't my favorite but more pleasant than this one... If you love sweet cake smelling lotion, you will really like this, it just wasn't for me! Gave it 4 stars because it is a quality moisturizer and I really appreciated the 0-fuss return/exchange policy!
customer_reviews.author: KMLG

customer_reviews.title: Works well, VERY strong (good) scent
customer_reviews.text: This hand cream works very well for dry hands. I ordered the Lemon Cream scent and WOW does it smell like lemon cream. The scent is very strong. Fortunately, I like the smell a lot. I'm only deducting a star because I know that not everyone likes smelly lotions as much as I do and that fragrances in general tend not to agree with everyone's skin.
customer_reviews.author: Elise

customer_reviews.title: Sticky & Smelly
customer_reviews.text: This goes on really sticky, but then makes hands feel soft and powdery, but still left a residue on my keyboard. It also seemed to make my hands much drier after washing them, so it's one of those hand creams that starts too strong then actually dries out your hands if you wash frequently throughout the day, creating a cycle of having to constantly re-apply and deal with greasy residue. The lavender scent borders on overpowering.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: A little goes a loooong way! This cream makes my day!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly this is the best self care thing I've bought all year. This literally smells like a lemon cookie - it's a thick cream that isn't greasy, and it really does make my day better when I use it. I needed some hand cream because of all the hand washing nowadays. Buy this - there's absolutely no way you will regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Christine C

customer_reviews.title: It puts the lotion in the cart bc this lotion ROCKS
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic lotion! I have crazy dry skin, and washing my hands with harsh soaps all day at work makes it hard to keep them from cracking. On top of that I get finger eczema from dryness/allergies/stress which are all in abundance currently. I have had other lotions but they either weren’t moisturizing enough or they left my hands slick and greasy. But this one hits all the boxes! It has a great smell that isn’t too strong, it smells natural and inoffensive. It soaks in well and does a great job. Would definitely buy again, for myself or as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Ally

customer_reviews.title: Love the smell
customer_reviews.text: Previously ordered the lavender scent and loved it. Tried to order once again and was out of stock. First time trying the lemon scent and truly loves it. Valentine's day is approaching and will order a few for my friends. Not only does it smells great but,it keep your hand moisturized. A little bit goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn DeGannes

customer_reviews.title: Works well but...
customer_reviews.text: Coming out of the tube, it was thick and really moisturizes well, but the smell was more of a mentholatum smell. I would use it at home, but not to keep in my purse as purchased for.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon S.

customer_reviews.title: Nasty  smell
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t read this carefully . Lemon CREAM. Yes it smells like cake batter . So sweet and not refreshing . I try to use it but it is unpleasant.
customer_reviews.author: Ribenium

customer_reviews.title: Great hand cream, not crazy about the lavender scent.
customer_reviews.text: The cream is amazing for dry hands! I will definitely buy this hand cream again, in other scents. We've purchased the lemon (amazing smell!) and the lavender. The lemon smells so delicious, like how you'd want lemon baked goods to smell. The lavender is a little sharp. We have so many different lavender products in our house (essential oils, actual lavender in the garden, dish soap, bar soap, other lotions) and I've never smelled a lavender like this one. I'm finishing the bottle, and will probably try the Pomegranate Acai or Grape Seed & Blackberry next.
customer_reviews.author: MsBlurgh

customer_reviews.title: Great Price for the Size but Oily
customer_reviews.text: This lotion is a great price for the size you get! Its bigger than travel size but fits well in the car or large purses. I really like the smell which is more of a coconut smell and has good ingredients. It is a little oily for a lotion which can be difficult but it makes a big difference in my dry hands.
customer_reviews.author: SloanCollins

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Smell
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the lavender scent and immediately washed my hands to get rid of the smell. I cannot believe that this product is advertised and sold to the public. It cannot be returned and so I will dispose of it as I do not think that anyone would want this scent on their hands. Don't buy! Other smells might be ok but I don't have the money to experiment.
customer_reviews.author: Mary C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift for a lotion lover
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a Christmas gift for a family member who enjoys scented lotions and who has only moderately dry skin. This type of lotion is perfect. It has a nice feel and the scent is a definite lemon cream. The recipient was very pleased. I feel like this is a good buy for the quantity and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Janet/ Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice feel/texture but strong scent.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to replace a previous hand cream by Love + Toast brand that has been discontinued. Overall, I like the formula in terms of how my hands feel. I have also been using this on my feet. However, the scent is pretty strong and artificial smelling -- almost like an artificial cucumber smell rather than the scent of green tea. It would be nice if they had a fragrance-free formula for the hands. If I purchased this product again, I might select a different scent.
customer_reviews.author: Missa

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I wash my hands a lot, and am always struggling to keep my hands from getting ridiculously dry and cracked. I thought I'd give this hand lotion a try, and I absolutely love it. It smells awesome, it doesn't sting or burn my super dry & irritated hands like some lotions do, and it doesn't have parabens like most hand lotions out there. I put some on the other day, and my mom immediately asked what it was and said how great it smelled! Lol It's good stuff, give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: oddlyoily

customer_reviews.title: very strong scent
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a hand lotion made with natural ingredients and had very high expectation about this cream after reading so many good reviews, especially how great and not overpowering the smell was. Well, I must have read the reviews of a different scent, because the aloe and green tea one is way too strong. I was so excited because the package arrived before Christmas (I bought a few to give as gifts), but as soon as I tried on my hands, I was very disappointed with the fragrance. It is so strong that even after many washes, the smell still didn't go away.
customer_reviews.author: Lotus Flower

customer_reviews.title: Great hand creme!
customer_reviews.text: This hand creme does a great job at moisturizing my hands without making them feel greasy. The formula absorbs quite quickly & has definitely helped heal my dry winter hands. The only complaint I have, and it is minor, is the scent. I think it's very nice, just a little too strong.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Brown

customer_reviews.title: Absorbs well
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought this would be too greasy to use during the day but after a couple minutes it got absorbed even on my palms. I usually like coconut scent but this one has another smell that is there too. Maybe the oils. I don't know. I don't hate it but will try a different scent next time.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't hydrate for very long. After several minutes my hands are showing dry wrinkles again and needing more. The scent isn't quite right either. I'd say if you see this product in the store, but it there. That way you're sure to get a fresh product, not one that possibly Sat in a warm truck or warehouse.
customer_reviews.author: Jwinc-etsy

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing and works wonderfully!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing. I use all kinds of different lotions, but this is my absolute favorite handcream. It smells amazing, it smells exactly like lemon meringue pie. The cream goes on heavy but it absorbs almost instantly so your hands are nice and soft without any greasy residue at all. Love using this at night before bed. My hands truly are silky soft afterwards. Highly recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly L. Wightman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this product! As a health care professional, I am always washing my hands and using gloves which can dry out my hands pretty badly. This lotion is super moisturizing without being greasy. The scent is amazing and I love that it is a natural product. The price is also awesome. I am planning on buying more as a Christmas gift for all of the other Docs that I work with at my clinic.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Decent lotion, not a fan of the scent.
customer_reviews.text: It's a very thick, heavy lotion, which is perfect for your hands. However, it did leave my hands feeling a little greasy afterward. And the lemon scent is cloyingly sweet. I'd have liked for the lemon to shine through a little more. All in all, not a bad lotion for the price, but next order I will definitely be trying a different scent.
customer_reviews.author: AGilmore

customer_reviews.title: Too strong
customer_reviews.text: It has a very strong fragrance. Much too strong for me. I don't even remember how moisturizing it was, because I used it only once. As soon as I smelled it, I mixed it with an unscented tube to try to reduce the fragrance. Now it is still too strong, but tolerable.
customer_reviews.author: PinterPaws

customer_reviews.title: Smells and works great !
customer_reviews.text: I have terrible eczema flare ups and most often on my hands. This cream is the best I have used. I really can't put anything on my skin, but I have to use something because I also have such dry skin. This cream causes the least reaction of the myriad of lotions and creams I have tried including better than the Rx cream my dermatologist gave me. I also love the lavender smell.
customer_reviews.author: Sandee

customer_reviews.title: A hand cream that keeps giving.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE J.R. Watkins Shea Butter Creme Pour Les Mains hand cream. It is extremely moisturizing, as I work with my hands a lot. The aloe and green tea scent is not too strong. It smells fresh as though you just got out of the shower. I love the fact that its moisturizing without a greasy look and feeling. And the fact that it is free from paraben, phthalate, propylene, glycol, and dye, is a huge bonus. I'd definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: ERIKA N

customer_reviews.title: Smells like cake!
customer_reviews.text: This dries quickly, so not greasy. It smells heavenly like memories of a lemon muffin/cake. I am extending sensitive to smells (no perfume), so it’s hard to find lotions that don’t give me a headache. This lotion has a charming label, and should make any vintage lover smile.
customer_reviews.author: L. Delacruz

customer_reviews.title: nice, I'd buy again
customer_reviews.text: the green tea and aloe smells a little strong going on but quickly diminishes. Nice thick creme that isn't greasy and moisturizes well .
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Smells yummy
customer_reviews.text: This smells like a lemon cream cookie. I paid it with the J.R Watkins body wash. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: MissRachel1

customer_reviews.title: Very moisturizing, the smell is meh
customer_reviews.text: I like how this makes my skin feel when I apply it. The peeling around my nails has definitely improved. The size of the tube is very generous and a very little products goes a long way. The only downfall is the smell; it’s not the worst but it’s also not the best. The smell quickly dissipates and isn’t a deal breaker for me.
customer_reviews.author: DamiKris

customer_reviews.title: Great product, use all the time
customer_reviews.text: I live in New Hampshire and it is winter. My hands are dry and rough and my knuckles got to the point where they were cracking a bit 😩 I bought the four pack and put one at the kitchen sink, in the bathroom, in the den, and by my bed. I use them all the time and my hands are doing much better. I got the grapefruit scent and it is heavenly. So fresh!
customer_reviews.author: Isaac Burkett

customer_reviews.title: I love the formula it's a heavier cream
customer_reviews.text: I love the formula it's a heavier cream, but has the somewhat watery feeling after absorbing which I really like. It works great for me I have very dry hands. The scent is very strong like almost artificial lemon cake which I but, not everyone enjoys.
customer_reviews.author: Sumner

customer_reviews.title: BEST MOISTURIZING
customer_reviews.text: Marvelous lotion. Sinks in quickly, leaves hands silky soft for hours later. That said, the scent is another matter. I'm a HUGE grapefruit fan, so I bought one to test. Absolutely no scent whatsoever. Buy it for its perfect softening agents, not the scent, as there isn't one.
customer_reviews.author: Newporter57Top Contributor: Watercolor Painting

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this lotion. IT smells so wonderful! It is a really strong smell though, fair warning! I love the scent of lavender though and would probably be just fine drowning in it. You only need a small amount to cover both hands, a little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: JollyNova

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizes my hands well!
customer_reviews.text: With the constant hand washing, my hands and skin between my fingers/ knuckles are drying up really badly that I have dry patches. So tried this and it is moisturizing my skin well! I do have to use it atleast 2 times a day but best used at night before sleeping so it stays on hand for atleast 6-8 hours. My skin has got softer. I actually like the fragrance and its mild because I am sensitive to strong perfume scents but because of my allergies, once in a while, I react to the fragrance (not a deal breaker!) but otherwise love this product!
customer_reviews.author: meghna

customer_reviews.title: Really Works!
customer_reviews.text: This hand cream is a great value for the money, you get 3.3 oz of product. It has a light, clean, aloe smell but it is not overpowering. This formula is very moisturizing and it is not too thick. One of my pet peeves is hand moisturizers that linger on the skin and feel greasy. In the winter my hands get extremely dry and cracked, but I have yet to experience this since using this cream. I appreciate brands like J.R. Watkins that use more natural ingredients. Overall, this product exceeded my expectations. I would recommend this to anyone who struggles with dry hands.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT IMPRESSED
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a cream with a lavender scent. The scent is almost non existent. It is very faint. I have to admit that it is a good moisturizer, but for me the product is too thick and feels heavy when applying. I won't buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: GINNYJAY

customer_reviews.title: Great products.
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. I’m 89 years old and looking back when the Watkins sales person would come by with their products. Mom would purchase if she had the money to do so. I especially remember vanilla.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Wright

customer_reviews.title: This is great hand lotion
customer_reviews.text: This is great hand lotion. It does go on a bit greasy, but it passes. It's thick and coats the hands very well. I like to use this after washing dishes and before bed. I also like to use it on my elbows as well...I have a constantly dry elbow, and this does a good job of keeping it soft for a bit.
customer_reviews.author: E. Lofton

customer_reviews.title: Very Moisturizing, High Quality & Cruelty Free
customer_reviews.text: Subtle scent and highly moisturizing. This works well on very dry hands. I like that it’s cruelty free - no animal testing and made in the USA. I will buy it again , especially for highly dry hands due to frequent washing during the pandemic.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Smells like delicious lemon cookies
customer_reviews.text: Smells like delicious lemon cookies. Literally made me go to the store and buy cookies. I can't deal with this every day.
customer_reviews.author: RZ

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used Watkins lemon soap for a long time and love the fresh clean scent. This lotion is nothing like that, it has a sickening sweet smell that is overwhelming. I’m disappointed with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Best lotion ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the best hand lotion. I work in healthcare and my hands go through a lot. This lotion keeps my hands moisturized through several rounds of sanitizer and smells amazing. I do not go to work without it.
customer_reviews.author: Ani

customer_reviews.title: Love the fresh lemon smell.
customer_reviews.text: When the Cracker Barrel store didn’t carry this skin cream anymore, I knew where to go to and it was Amazon and there it was.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pricey, nice scent
customer_reviews.text: Pricey, nice scent, worked no better than drug store brand.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Black Unger

customer_reviews.title: Good functional cream. Just the aroma is too strong.
customer_reviews.text: I use a hand cream several times per day in a cold time. This one does its work well. But the smell is not very pleasant and quite strong. Next time I probably again order this brand but with another aroma.
customer_reviews.author: Mariia

customer_reviews.title: Okay product
customer_reviews.text: This product was okay. I have very rough hands and I was hoping that this would help somewhat, based on the reviews this item got. But, it didn’t help with my rough hands. After applying it, 10 minutes later it would start to feel rough again and make my hands feel harder. This product didn’t work well for my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy B

customer_reviews.title: Really Does the job!!
customer_reviews.text: Working with paper or wood saps the moisture from your hands. This product really restores your hands to a soft supple feel and smells great too.
customer_reviews.author: Akron Traveler

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always liked Watkins products. I tried the Aloe and Green Tea fragrance at a hotel and just loved it. When I got home I looked for the products. The hand cream has shea butter and cocoa butter.
customer_reviews.author: Lori M.

customer_reviews.title: Thick and creamy hand cream! :)
customer_reviews.text: So my husband and I fell in love with the pomegranate and acai body wash. We were on the search for the hand cream version and came upon this one. The smell is nice and subtle! The consistency is thick and creamy. Once applied, it doesn't feel heavy and sticky. I dislike lotions that feels like it dissipates on the skin like water once it's applied, similar to how some of the Suave lotions are, and this one doesn't do that. It's also small enough to fit in my medium size purse so I really like to carry it.
customer_reviews.author: MJae Vang

customer_reviews.title: Makes my hands soft
customer_reviews.text: I use this product everyday , smells nice and feels great!
customer_reviews.author: PamelaAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great lemony scent
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Not sticky but is very moisturizing for hands
customer_reviews.author: Cam32

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: My hands get extremely dry in the winter. They crack and swell. It's pretty painful. This significantly improved my hands in one day. It's creamy, soothing, and not greasy.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn Anne

customer_reviews.title: fake a clean house
customer_reviews.text: wanted to love it based on the reviews, took first sniff and thought of the lemon cupcakes others had mentioned... then my teenage daughter said "it smells like that cleaning product". ruined
customer_reviews.author: eemommy

customer_reviews.title: Smooth Lavender Scent
customer_reviews.text: I love LOVE this lotion. I first got a tube of it in a Fab Fit Fun box. Once I finished the tube I searched the internet to find another! It has a great lavender scent and is smooth without a greasy feel! Great for every day use!
customer_reviews.author: mckannak

customer_reviews.title: Is the product supposed to be open?
customer_reviews.text: I like the product but it came open It looks used 🤬
customer_reviews.author: Maisha Rahman

customer_reviews.title: So hydrating!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this lotion!!! It makes my hands so soft and smells so yummy (lavender)! I am a little older and I have small children--the combination of age and hand washing has left my hands drier than before. This lotion does a great job at bedtime and throughout the day of keeping my hands hydrated. It goes on thicker than a lot of lotions, but doesn't leave any lasting greasy feel!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cream, great value
customer_reviews.text: The texture is quite creamy. Moisturizes very well. I ordered two. One for me and one as part of a gift for a Yankee Swap. The tube has greater volume than I'd realized making it a really good value. The scent is light and pleasing.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer M

customer_reviews.title: A rich Handcream
customer_reviews.text: This cream feels good and first rubbed onto the hands. It is just that the softened effects don’t seem to last very long. I also like the no odor aspect of it.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Replaced my $26 Handcream with the same ingredients and the smell is fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: Omg the SMELL!!! So good, like a lemon cake and I don’t like typical lemon smell in products. I needed a replacement for my Perlier cream that goes for $23-$26, at under $5 and literally the exact same ingredients...I’m shook! I love it and it will be my new go to. Probably my favorite purchase on Amazon in a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Oblinger

customer_reviews.title: Not greasy, VERY strong scent
customer_reviews.text: Moisturizes well, isn't greasy but is a little tacky. I'd like for it to absorb a little better. Biggest issue is how strong the scent is. Applying a small amount to my hands and my wife can smell it from across the room. If the scent was toned down significantly, or they made it in an unscented variety, I'd be a huge fan.
customer_reviews.author: John Conklin II

customer_reviews.title: Very good hand cream
customer_reviews.text: I wash my hands all day at work so it’s hard to keep my hands from getting dry. I have tried many lotions, creams, and oils. This is my favorite. In addition to keeping my hands moisturized, there is also a nice peach fragrance.
customer_reviews.author: Constance Prater

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this lotion. I can't say enough how much I love this lotion, actually. It makes my incredibly dried out hands so happy every time I use it. On top of that, it has the loveliest scent.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Great lavender cream !!!
customer_reviews.text: Very good texture, the lavender scent is just perfect and it is not too strong or too weak. And with most of natural ingredients, this is a steal !!! Will definitely buy more !!!
customer_reviews.author: clarissa

customer_reviews.title: Works great and smells great
customer_reviews.text: This hand cream really nurtures and hydrates your hands. It get absorbed well and doesn't leave a greasy layer (although there seems to be some sort of protective layer on your skin). Best of all: it smells like lemon cakes, so yummie.
customer_reviews.author: sabvd

customer_reviews.title: Amazing , light lemon scent!
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand. Reasonable. Very moisturizing. This scent is so very fresh and clean. I keep one in the kitchen on the sink and love how it freshens my hands after cooking and doing dishes.
customer_reviews.author: MichelleC

customer_reviews.title: Works fine, strong smell
customer_reviews.text: I'm not in love with cream, though it's also not terrible. The smell is pretty strong so when I wear it I walk around feeling that I smell like a lemon cake. It also goes on kind of greasy, but after about 10 minutes it settles into the skin and the greasy feeling goes away.
customer_reviews.author: J. Harwood

customer_reviews.title: Smells good enough to eat- just don’t
customer_reviews.text: Smells so much like lemon meringue it’s hard to not eat the tube! Seriously though, it DOES smell fantastic, it is not greasy, and all the other teachers at work and kids in my classroom love it. I gifted my colleagues with the lotion wrapped in ribbons this holiday and they were all thrilled. When I run out, I’ll be ordering more for myself as well!
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Impressed!
customer_reviews.text: I was worried the lotion was going to be a bit too oily for my liking, but I was wrong. Its very smooth and soaks into my skin within seconds and the scent is not too powerful! Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING for dry, winter hands!
customer_reviews.text: Rich, creamy, natural lemon scent and seems to last through a few hand washings. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: MateoTAZ

customer_reviews.title: It depends on your preference!
customer_reviews.text: I really lie this lotion but I’ve used this on my clients after they’ve gotten their nails done and none of them like the sticky residue it leaves. Its not that bad in my opinion. I think its worth it if you want full moisture.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Araujo

customer_reviews.title: Great Handcream
customer_reviews.text: I really like this hand cream - it absorbs really well, has a pleasant scent and is reasonably priced. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: allakit

product_meta.title: J.R. Watkins Natural Moisturizing Hand Cream, Coconut, Hydrating Hand Moisturizer with Shea Butter, Cocoa Butter, and Avocado Oil, USA Made and Cruelty Free, 3.3oz
product_meta.description: Scent:Coconut| Size:3.3 Ounce (Pack of 1)Natural shea and cocoa butters and plant oils protect, soothe and condition delicate skin. This rich, non-greasy cream is ideal for dry, rough skin such as hands and feet, or use as an all-over body moisturizer.
feature_bullets: REVITALIZE YOUR SKIN: Leave your hands soft, smooth, and healthily moisturized with J.R Watkins nourishing hand cream. Made with shea butter, cocoa butter, and avocado oil, our hand cream nourishes and hydrates to improve the look and feel of dry, aging, or cracked skin.

INSPIRED BY NATURE: Give your skin the best with a natural moisturizing hand cream. We believe in creating high-quality products with ingredients from natural sources that work even with sensitive skin. Never have to worry about irritating parabens, dyes, or phthalates.

DELIGHTFUL SCENT: This is more than just a hand cream moisturizer, it’s a treat for your senses. You’ll love the pleasant scent that uplifts your spirits with every application. Liberally apply our shea butter hand cream before bed and slip into a relaxed state of mind.
100% CRUELTY-FREE: J.R Watkins is proudly certified and recognized by Leaping Bunny as a brand that doesn’t test on animals. Get a cleansing bar soap crafted with a conscience.
MADE IN THE USA: Since 1868, right in the USA. That’s 150 years of experience and thousands of satisfied customers.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
